tableGroups.title: DataTable Pinning Props
tableGroups.description: Column pinning controls available on the DataTable component.

items.name: enableColumnPinning
items.description: Enable column pinning functionality. When enabled, users can pin columns to left or right.

items.name: onColumnPinningChange
items.description: Callback invoked whenever column pinning state changes (columns pinned or unpinned).

items.name: initialState.columnPinning
items.description: Initial pinning configuration with column IDs for left and right pinning.

tableGroups.title: Column Pinning Properties
tableGroups.description: Column-level properties for controlling pinning behavior.

items.name: enablePinning
items.description: Enable or disable pinning for this specific column. Set to false to prevent pinning.

slotPropGroups.title: Column Pinning Control SlotProps
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the column pinning control component via slotProps.columnPinningControl.

items.name: title
items.description: Menu dropdown title for the pinning control.

items.name: menuSx
items.description: Styling for the pinning menu container.

items.name: iconButtonProps
items.description: Props for the pin icon button.

items.name: tooltipProps
items.description: Props for the tooltip shown on hover.

items.name: badgeProps
items.description: Props for the pinned count badge.
